ygData.subject: Re: The Real Scoop on Genni
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I wonder if the person responsible for the pie tin sketch exploit had a hand in this.... Rokenn Swiftsong - Karana server Master Craftsmen of Societus
ygData.messageBody:
>From: John Robertson <johnr@...>
>Aren't all exploits caused by a lack of attention to detail on the
>developer's part? :)
>
>This was just more obvious than most. As soon as I heard there was an
>exploit involving this
>NPC, it took me about 2 seconds to guess what it was. You'd think it might
>occur to a developer
>before it went to live servers. :(
>
>Jyzan

I wonder if the person responsible for the pie tin sketch exploit had a hand
in this....
